resources.string: Welcome to AmeriNet. \nCalculate your net worth in simple steps
First, add your assets. \n\nYour assets comprise of your large assets (value of your home, car e.t.c), liquid asset (your savings account, investment e.t.c) and personal items of value.
Next, add your liabilities. \n\nAdd your liability Your liabilities comprise of your major liabilities (loans, mortgage) and personal liabilities (student loans, credit cards, debt you may owe).
